Title: Cold War
Writer: Pawel Pawlikowski (story), Pawel Pawlikowski (screenplay), Janusz Glowacki (screenplay), Piotr Borkowski (screenplay with the collaboration of)
Actors: Joanna Kulig, Tomasz Kot, Borys Szyc, Agata Kulesza
Plot: In the 1950s, a music director falls in love with a singer and tries to persuade her to flee communist Poland for France.
Language: Polish, French, Croatian, German, Russian, Serbian, Italian
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 46 wins & 113 nominations.
